title: Anthropic: "Applicants should not use AI assistants"
author: twapi
aiHeadline: In a Shocking Turn of Events, Anthropic Tells Job Applicants to Actually Use Their Brains and Not Rely on AI Assistants, Because Apparently That's What Humans are For, Who Knew?

title: Our channel on YouTube has been deleted due to “spam and deceptive policies”
author: richrichardsson
aiHeadline: YouTube's Latest Victim: Some Poor Soul's Channel Got Deleted for 'Spam and Deceptive Policies', AKA the Classic 'We Don't Like You' Excuse, Leaving the Owner to Cry Foul and Question the Very Fabric of Online Justice

title: Httptap: View HTTP/HTTPS requests made by any Linux program
author: alexflint
aiHeadline: Introducing Httptap: Because You've Always Wanted to Spy on Your Linux Program's Internet Activities, Like a Digital Private Investigator, Except Instead of Cheating Spouses, You Get to See Which Websites Your Programs are Secretly Visiting

title: Ask HN: Who is hiring? (February 2025)
author: whoishiring
aiHeadline: It's That Time of the Month Again: 'Who is Hiring?' Asks the Age-Old Question on Hacker News, Because Let's Face it, We're All Just a Bunch of Coders Desperately Seeking Our Next Paycheck, and Maybe, Just Maybe, This Post Will Lead Us to the Promised Land of Employment

title: Show HN: I convert videos to printed flipbooks for living
author: momciloo
aiHeadline: In a World Where Videos are So Last Season, One Brave Soul has Decided to Take the Road Less Traveled and Convert Them into Printed Flipbooks, Because Who Needs YouTube When You Can Have a Bunch of Papers Flapping in the Wind, Am I Right?
